mapper.select: select n.nno, n.uno, n.cdt, n.type, n.rdt, n.fwer_no, u.nick fwer_nick, u.photo fwer_photo, n.bno, b.name b_name, b.photo b_photo, n.cno, u2.uno c_uno, u2.nick c_nick, u2.photo c_photo, c.momno, a.title from noti n left outer join user u on u.uno = n.fwer_no left outer join badge b on b.bno = n.bno left outer join comment c on c.cno = n.cno left outer join article a on c.arno = a.arno left outer join user u2 on c.uno = u2.uno where n.uno=#{no} order by cdt desc
